Package simulation.montecarlo

Class MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation

java.lang.Object
simulation.montecarlo.MonteCarloSimulation
simulation.montecarlo.MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Serializable, AutoCloseable, Runnable
public class MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation extends MonteCarloSimulation implements Closeable, Runnable
Monte Carlo simulation with multiple temperatures (holds multiple objects of SingleTMonteCarloSimulation)
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation

      public MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation​(double[] T, SingleTMonteCarloSimulation[] subSimulations, long maxSweeps, long seed, org.apache.commons.math3.random.MersenneTwister rnd, boolean continueFromSave, boolean parallelTemperingOff, boolean checkpoint, SimulationCheckpointer checkpointer, double spinSize, double tol, double J_ex)
      Constructs a new MultipleTMonteCarloSimulation object with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      T - array of temperatures to simulate
      subSimulations - array of single-temperature simulations to run under this multiple-temperature simulation
      maxSweeps - total number of MC sweeps
      seed - random number generator seed
      rnd - random number generator object
      continueFromSave - whether to continue from a previously saved simulation
      parallelTemperingOff - whether to turn off parallel tempering (never swap temperatures)
      checkpoint - whether to periodically create a checkpoint from which the simulation can be restarted
      checkpointer - Checkpointer object used for saving and reading the simulation checkpoints
      spinSize - Typical magnetic moment based on the external transverse field
      tol - tolerance for convergence of self-consistent calculation
      J_ex - Exchange interaction parameter

    • trySwitch

      public void trySwitch​(int t)
      try and swap (t)th and (t+1)th simulations. sets lastSwapAccepted within that sub-simulation
      Parameters:
      t - simulation index to try to swap
